title: Can't connect to chat
body: Every time I log into client I immediately get 2 errors with the pop-up message that says "an Unknown Error has occurred Sorry about that. We've sent a report to the server." and then it tells me to check the support site or the forums. I immediately can't connect to chat and it doesn't let me reconnect. Any help would be highly appreciated!

replies.body: There is currently a chat issue. You can check for updates on the top of the client/launcher signified by a /!\ sign or here ( http://status.leagueoflegends.com/ ).

There were issues with chat servers last night that caused some server hiccups, Keep an eye on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for updates on server problems.  All should be well now!
